resources.string: FriendZone_Avenger: Take care of the people you love.
To ensure the correct installation of " FRIENDZONE_AVENGER ", you must press the \"ACTIVATE\" button below.
The friendzone has invaded you.Love or be a friend.
By clicking \'Yes\' you will disassemble the avengers... administration privileges on this device. Without these privileges,We won\'t be able to protect your love.\nAre you sure?
